name: Planetravel
description:
P L A N E T R A V E L

This is fast action-oriented puzzle game.

You find yourself as a creature, living on his own technological planet, dreaming to make it beautiful. Once you realize, that gardens don't grow without real nature and decide to reach new green planet to make your dreams come true!

But road to your dreams can't be without stones and wholes, so you have to overcome all the obstacles! Fight for your future!

Controls:
WASD  - Movement
Space - Jump
E - Interact
Mouse - Puzzles

This game was created for AngrySmile's Beginners Circle Jam #3
